name: Run (itch) (Hieu Le)
description: You stole something which you can't remember what it was from a strange city and now you have to make a run for it. Strangely, there is only one ice-covered road in this city, and its length isn't defined in meters, but rather in coins. Hitting pedestrians will enrage the police officers, making them chasing you quicker. Godspeed.
